subject: Re: Re: USA Warehouse
description_text:
It’s an eBay order. 11-13109-13903 shipped from US warehouse on May 22. I saw additional info on the website now that says pro x can only use VAM pro one direction. The control box I have looks identical to the new ultra hub on the outside it seems, so curious if it will work fully.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  

  
  
  
>

> >   
> >
> >   
> >  For Pro X and Plus X pedals only (Pro X pedals require a software and control box firmware upgrade, tutorials are included in the manual; Pro and Pro Plus pedals require a new control box purchased separately).
> >

> >   
> >   
> >   
> >   
> >

> >
> >   
> > Thanks.

> > > Pro x ultra 2 has not yet arrived in the US warehouse, and the haptic motor has not yet been put on the shelves. Please pay attention to our store and you will be notified when it is put on the shelves.

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Emfinger,  Hello, If you purchased the ProX Upgrade from eBay, it does support the VAM vibration motor and provides excellent haptic feedback. However, if you need the full VAM Pro experience, you’ll need to purchase the vibration motor, power supply, and a ProX Ultra control board directly from our official website. All items are shipped from China using UPS, and delivery to the U.S. typically takes only 3–5 days, which is quite fast.
